data.name: Andi Nugroho
data.about_me: I am a Blockchain & Software Engineer specializing in smart contracts, DeFi, NFTs, and Web3 applications.
core_skills: With expertise in Solidity, Rust, React, and Node.js, I build secure and scalable blockchain solutions. I have experience developing DeFi protocols, NFT marketplaces, cross-chain platforms, and crypto wallets while optimizing smart contract efficiency and security. Passionate about Layer-2 solutions and interoperability, I stay ahead of emerging blockchain innovations.
data.contact_note: I am open to collaboration and technology-based projects. If you're interested, feel free to contact me!
